item.title: Microsoft Deploys 4,600 Blackwell Ultra GPUs - Offbeat AI Watch
item.description: Microsoft's massive AI infrastructure deployment signals infrastructure race escalation. Plus OpenAI's custom silicon strategy, AMD equity warrants, and regulatory tightening across UK/EU.

item.title: The Week AI Went Everywhere - Offbeat AI Watch
item.description: From fusion reactors to your living room: how artificial intelligence embedded itself into every corner of technology. HEAT-ML fusion breakthrough, AI weather forecasting revolution, and major hardware launches from Amazon, Apple, and Google.
item.author: Shashwat Ghosh
